text: Mount Adams is the second-highest mountain in the Pacific Northwest of North America. It is a volcano in the Cascade Range. Adams is located about 35 miles (56 km) east of Mount St. Helens. == Other websites == * USGS Cascades Volcano Observatory * Backpacking information at FreeTrails.org * U.S. Forest Service page Category:Volcanoes of Washington (state)
title: Mount Adams (Washington)
